descriptionHtml:
[center][size=70]Craftable Soulgems V. 1.1beta[/size][/center]
[center]by Octavvius[/center]
[u]Describtion[/u]
This is my second mod after [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=956]Craftable Staves[/url]. This mod allows you to up or downgrad your soulgems in a Smith, Now you never will have again the problem of having mass of low soulstones but no High Soulstones ;D Hope i can finish the mod until the end of the week.

[u]Upgrade-/Downgradeable Soulgems[/u]
[u]Upgrading[/u]
The empty soulgems recipes are the same just with empty Soulgems.
Name : Items required
(1 Empty Petty Soulstone: 1 Amethyt,1 Moonstone,1 Dwarven Oil)
1 Charged Lesser Soulstone:3 Charged Petty Soulges
1 Charged Common Soulstone:3 Charged Lesser Soulgems
1 Charged Greater Soulstone:3 Charged Common Soulgems
1 Charged Grand Soulstone:3 Charged Greater Soulgems
(1 Charged Black Soulstone:2 Charged Grand Soulgems,1 Human Flesh)
[u]Downgrading[/u]
(2)3 Charged Grand Soulstones:1 Charged Black Soulgem
2 Charged Greater Soulstone:1 Charged Grand Soulgem
2 Charged Common Soulstone:1 Charged Greater Soulgem
2 Charged Lesser Soulstone:1 Charged Common Soulgem
2 Charged Petty Soulstones:1 Charged Lesser Soulgem

( ) means that this is just in a optional file.
They all can be found in the Smith menu in the section Misc (or in a forge if you install the version with forge)
If you don\'t like my mod for craftable black soulgems just looke at this mod by Zer0Burn: [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1723]Craftable Black SoulGems[/url]

[u]Install[/u]
Before you install the mod just be sure to make a backup of Skyrim.
1. Download the file and copy the .esp file in Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/data
2. Start the Skyrim launcher and just go to the data file option in the middle then thick the box next to Craftable Staffs.esp on ( if it isnt automaticly)
3. Start the game and have fun ;D

[u]Uninstall[/u]
Just delete the .esp file from the \"data\" folder

[u]To do list[/u]
+ adding craftable low soulgems with other materials.

[u]Changelog[/u]
26.11.2011 - V.1.1 - Adding craftable empty soulgems in version 1.1- changed that you can get 3 grand soulgems out of 1 black
24.11.2011 - V.1.0 - Adding a file where you now can craft the soulgems in a forge.
23.11.2011 - V.1.0 - Fixed the bug with the firewood.
23.11.2011 - V.1.0 - Adding a new file without craftable Black Soulgems after request.
23.11.2011 - V.1.0 - Releasing the mod in his own File.

[u]Some Mods you really should look:[/u]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=956]Craftable Staves[/url] by Octavvius (me)
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=799#content]More Craftables[/url] by AeonVita
[url=http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1042]Jewelcraft Craft and Expansion[/url] by Happy_Strike

[u]Credits[/u]
AeonVita - By making the Craftable Artifacts (now More Craftables) so i had an base where i could built my mod. 
Timeslip  - For making FOMM and TESsnip wich i used to build the mod
[url=http://www.newvegasnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=36901]Fallout Mod Manager(TESsnip)[/url] 

PS: sry that the screens are in german.

If you Like my Mod and want to support me with a little bit(even 1 dollar/euro etc. are great!)
Just Donate to me on Paypal:

[/color][/url][/u]
Just thanks a lot if you donate a little bit and be sure that you help me a lot ;D
author: Octavvius
